title: FAQ Pronunciation
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [FAQs](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQs) : Pronunciation**

Following is a list of names and their correct pronunciations (using English orthography).

**This is a wiki: please contribute!**

_Typefaces:_

[Arnold Boecklin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Arnold%20Boecklin): AR-nollt BOKE-lin [ˈaːnolt bøklˈin]  
 [Antique Olive](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Antique%20Olive): on-teek uh-LEEV  
 [Cochin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cochin): co-SHAN [koˈʃɛ̃ː]  
 [Elena](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Elena): EL-en-uh  
 [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eurostile): æu-ro-STI-le (true?)  
 [Fenice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fenice): fe-NEE-chay  
 [Fette Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fette%20Fraktur): FET-uh FROK-tour  
 [Forza](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Forza): fort-zah  
 [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Futura): foo-TOOR-ah  
 [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Helvetica%20Neue): Helvetica noy-a  
 [Klavika](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klavika): KLA-vi-kuh  
 [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Neutraface): NOY-trah FACE  
 [Officina](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Officina): OFF-eh-CHEE-nah  
 [Seravek](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Seravek): SEER-uh-vek  
 [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Univers): oo’-nih-VAIR  
 [Verlag](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Verlag): fair-log  
 [Vitesse](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Vitesse): vih-TESS (or v-TESS)

_Typographers:_

[Benguiat, Ed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Edward%20Benguiat): BEN-gat  
 [Carnase, Tom](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tom%20Carnase): car-NAY-zee  
 [Frere-Jones, Tobias](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tobias%20Frere-Jones): FRARE-JONES.  
 [Hoefler, Jonathan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jonathan%20Hoefler): HEFF-lur  
 [Licko, Zuzana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zuzana%20Licko): litch-co  
 [Lubalin, Herb](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Herb%20Lubalin): loo-BAL-in  
 [Zapf, Hermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf): HARE-mon TZOPF  
 [Tschichold, Jan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jan%20Tschichold): yonn CHICK-old  
 [Veljovic, Jovica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veljovic): yo-VEET-sa VELL-yoh-vitch’

_Typefaces named after typographers:_

[Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Didot): dee-doh  
 [Fournier](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fournier): FOORN-yay  
 [Sabon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sabon): sah-BO(nh)  
 [Peignot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peignot): pay-NYOH

**Discussion:**  
 [Pronouncing Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/28042)  
 [How do you pronounce "Benguiat" anyway?](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/7940)  
 [Neue?](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/15053)  
 [Pronunciation Question](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/15491)  
 [Font Name Pronounciation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/10155)  
 [On pronunciation of names](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/1089)  
 [how do you pronounce...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/33249)  
 [Futura Pronunciation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172215/http:/typophile.com/node/35311)
author: Eric_West
